pinyin: chi3 you3 suo3 duan3 , cun4 you3 suo3 chang2

definitions.chi3 you3 suo3 duan3 , cun4 you3 suo3 ch: lit. for some things a foot may be too short, and for the other an inch will suffice (proverb); fig. everyone has their strong and weak points; everything has its advantages and disadvantages;
